Html:
Feel a bit stupid for asking but how do I build this in VS2010?

I've downloaded the Irony_2013_12_12 release and opened the Irony_All.2010.sln - when I attempt to build 010.irony.2010 I get a bunch of errors for the Irony/Parsing/_new folder for eg:

Error 2 Source file 'W:\code\lib\Irony_2013_12_12\Irony_2013_12_12\Irony\Parsing_new\GlrParser.cs' could not be opened ('Unspecified error ') 010.Irony.2010

The other missing files are _new/NewScanner/_partialDefs.cs _new/NewScanner/NewScanner.cs _new/NewScanner/SourceSegments.cs and _new/NewScanner/TerminalLookupByPrefix.cs

This folder doesn't exist in the zip file but folders _new/NewScanner _new/CompilerDirective appear to be generated when I attempt to build. What am I missing?
just remove these files from the solution/projects. Or better use 2012 version
